raw_text:
the balcony is on the east side in front of living room
the balcony is 88 sqrt feet (lenght 22 feet) and ( width 4 feet) 5 over 1 the balcony 2 is in the east side next the balcony 1 
the balcony 2 is 36 sqrt feet (lenght 3 feet) and ( width 12 feet) 5 over 2 the bathroom is on the south west corner between the living room and the kitchen
the bathroom is 36 sqrt feet (lenght 12 feet) and ( width 3 feet) 5 over 2 the common room is on the west side next  the living room between the master and the kitchen.
the common room is 196 sqrt feet (lenght 14 feet) and ( width 14 feet) 1 over 1 the kitchen is next the living room between the common room and the bathroom.
the kitchen is 84 sqrt feet (lenght 12 feet) and ( width 7 feet) 5 over 3 the living room is in the center next the kitchen and the master room
the kitchen is 700 sqrt feet (lenght 35 feet) and ( width 20 feet) 5 over 3 the manster room is on the north west corner between the living room and the common room
the manster room is 216 sqrt feet (lenght 12 feet) and ( width 18 feet) 5 over 4
